review_method: Direct CLI inspection via jira-as search --help and subcommand helps

findings.documented: jira-as search filter create --name "My Bugs" --jql "type = Bug AND assignee = currentUser()" --favourite
findings.actual_cli: jira-as search filter create -n NAME -j JQL [-f] [--share-project TEXT]
findings.issue: Long-form flag names may not work; CLI help shows short flags are primary. Testing with --name and --jql may fail on actual command execution.
findings.recommendation: Verify with actual execution, or use short forms: -n, -j, -f for maximum compatibility

findings.documented: jira-as search filter create --name "Team Filter" --jql "project = PROJ" --description "Team issues" --share-project PROJ
findings.actual_cli: CLI accepts -n, -j, -d for these, not verified if long forms work
findings.issue: Long-form flags consistency unclear from help output; suggests using short forms
findings.recommendation: Test and confirm long-form flag support, or standardize on short forms in documentation

findings.actual_option: Share with user (account ID) - available in CLI but not in documented examples
findings.recommendation: Add example: jira-as search filter share 10042 --user abc123

findings.actual_option: Get specific filter by ID - available in CLI
findings.recommendation: Add example: jira-as search filter list --id 10042

findings.description: Documentation only shows basic validation but CLI supports showing parsed structure and JSON output
findings.recommendation:
Add examples:
- jira-as search validate "your query" --show-structure
- jira-as search validate "your query" --output json

findings.description: Allows specifying AND/OR operator for joining clauses but not documented
findings.recommendation: Add example: jira-as search build --clause "project = PROJ" --clause "type = Bug" --operator OR

findings.issue: Correct syntax matches CLI, but skill table at line 76 shows --favourites in documentation
findings.note: No fix needed - this is accurate

findings.also_available: -n, --name TEXT option for running by name
findings.recommendation: Add example showing name-based filter execution

findings.issue: Documentation inconsistently shows long-form flags (--name, --jql, --favourite) but examples elsewhere use different conventions
findings.recommendation: Standardize on short-form flags throughout or verify long-form support works

findings.issue: Template name 'sprint-backlog' not verified to exist. Documentation should show how to list templates first
findings.recommendation: Update to: First run 'jira-as search build --list-templates' to see available templates, then use one in example

findings.issue: Documentation shows --unshare with --project but CLI expects permission ID
findings.recommendation: Clarify: Use 'jira-as search filter share 10042 --list' to see permission IDs, then '--unshare PERMISSION_ID'

items: All main command names: query, export, validate, build, bulk-update, suggest, fields, functions, filter
create, list, run, update, favourite, share, delete

CRITICAL: Verify and document actual long-form flag support for filter create (--name, --jql, --description)
Test all documented examples to ensure they work with actual CLI
HIGH: Add documented examples for filter share --user option
Add documented examples for filter list --id option
Document build command's --operator flag for AND/OR clause joining
MEDIUM: Add example showing filter run by name (--name option)
Clarify filter share --unshare syntax (requires permission ID, not project)
LOW: Update template example to show --list-templates first
Add more diverse examples showing different flag combinations

overall_assessment.accuracy: 78% - Several option omissions and syntax issues
overall_assessment.usability: Good - Examples are mostly clear but some options missing
